title: JSON schema for i18n in View Exports SVG extension for Visual Studio Code

iconExtractionInProgress.description: Message displayed when icon extraction is in progress

noIconsFound.description: Message displayed when no icons are found

noFileSelected.description: Message displayed when no file is selected

searchMinChars.description: Message displayed when the search input has less than 3 characters
searchMinChars.default: Please enter at least 3 characters to search...

noExistedFile.description: Message displayed when a file does not exist
noExistedFile.patternErrorMessage: The message must contain the variable {file}

errorSettingWebviewMessageListener.description: Message displayed when an error occurs setting the webview message listener

invalidSvgTag.description: Message displayed when an invalid SVG tag is found
invalidSvgTag.patternErrorMessage: The message must contain the variable {tag}

declarationNotFound.description: Message displayed when a declaration is not found
declarationNotFound.default: Declaration named {name} not found in file {file}
declarationNotFound.patternErrorMessage: The message must contain the variables {name} and {file}

svgFileNotFound.description: Message displayed when an SVG file is not found
svgFileNotFound.patternErrorMessage: The message must contain the variable {file}

svgComponentNotFoundFile.description: Message displayed when an SVG component is not found in a file
svgComponentNotFoundFile.default: SVG component {name} not found in file {file}
svgComponentNotFoundFile.patternErrorMessage: The message must contain the variables {name} and {file}

errorExtractingSvgComponent.description: Message displayed when an error occurs extracting an SVG component
errorExtractingSvgComponent.patternErrorMessage: The message must contain the variable {name}

invalidAttribute.description: Message displayed when an invalid attribute is found
invalidAttribute.patternErrorMessage: The message must contain the variables {attr}, {expected}, and {actual}

errorScanningWorkspace.description: Message displayed when an error occurs scanning the workspace

errorScanningFiles.description: Message displayed when an error occurs scanning files

errorOpeningFile.description: Message displayed when an error occurs opening a file
errorOpeningFile.patternErrorMessage: The message must contain the variable {file}

errorSavingCache.description: Message displayed when an error occurs saving the cache

errorLoadingCache.description: Message displayed when an error occurs loading the cache

CacheManager has not been initialized.description: Message displayed when the CacheManager has not been initialized

methodNotImplemented.description: Message displayed when a method is not implemented
